response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value and potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at an exceptional price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. We understand the importance of this decision and are committed to ensuring a smooth and transparent transaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
